text: Alberto De Martino (12 June 1929 - 2 June 2015) was an Italian movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Rome, Italy. He was known for his movies O.K. Connery, Holocaust 2000, and The Pumaman. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Writers from Rome
title: Alberto De Martino
